label: 種子島
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: [The island south of Kagoshima, the headquarters city of the Satsuma domain of southernmost Kyushu, on which some] Portuguese traders in a Chinese junk came ashore [in 1543].  This first, and presumably accidental, encounter between Europeans and Japanese proved to be an epochal event, for from the Portuguese the Japanese learned about Western firearms (p. 1). [鹿児島、薩摩]
